name: Austen and Her Contemporaries
description: A study of selected novels by Austen and of works by such contemporaries as Radcliffe, Godwin, Wollstonecraft, Wordsworth, Edgeworth, Scott, and Shelley, in the context of the complex literary, social, and political relationships of that time. [36L]
prerequisites: 1.0 credit in ENG and 3.0 additional credits.
